thread.title: Govinda and Shakti Kapoor all set to create a laughter riot on 'The Kapil Sharma Show'
thread.title_full: Govinda and Shakti Kapoor all set to create a laughter riot on 'The Kapil Sharma Show' - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Govinda and Shakti Kapoor all set to create a laughter riot on 'The Kapil Sharma Show'
text:
After Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan, it is now time for veteran actors Govinda and Shakti Kapoor to grace Kapil Sharma 's comedy show.
Govinda will be present with his wife Sunita for the promotion of his upcoming movie 'Aa Gaya Hero'.
Preeti Simoes took to Twitter after shooting for the episode. She tweeted "N itz a wrap! @Govinda_HeroNo1 @kikusharda @WhoSunilGrover #TheKapilSharmaShow"
N itz a wrap! @Govinda_HeroNo1 @kikusharda @WhoSunilGrover #TheKapilSharmaShow pic.twitter.com/qaJe0d3gC7
â€” Preeti simoes (@preeti_simoes) February 20, 2017 With Govinda, the king of comedy, and Shakti Kapoor on the show, it will surely be a laughter riot.
READ ALSO: Know all about 'The Kapil Sharma Show'
Govinda's film 'Aa Gaya Hero' is produced by him and is all set to hit the theatres on March 3.
The Kapil Sharma Show airs on Sony Television.
